long_description: The Benchmade Fixed Contego Knife by Warren Osborne is built to be tough and durable to handle big cutting tasks in camp or at home. Premium CPM-S30V stainless-steel blade features a reverse tanto design. Smooth, contoured black G10 fiberglass/epoxy handle. The Benchmade Fixed Contego Knife includes a multiple-position molded sheath with adjustable detent.
short_description: The Benchmade Fixed Contego Knife by Warren Osborne is built to be tough and durable to handle big cutting tasks in camp or at home.
